entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Gillam
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:30 PM CDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -5.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gillam Airport 6:44 PM CDT Monday 13 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -5.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -8.4°C
Wind: WNW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 13. Wind chill near minus 25. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 13 March 2023
